id-113459.title: Electrician Company
id-113459.post-content:
If you run a service business, your website needs to inspire confidence and make it easy for people to reach you. The new Electrician Company WordPress template delivers exactly that.

It’s a clean, professional design built to showcase your expertise, highlight trust factors, and turn visitors into paying clients.

Whether you’re an independent electrician, a local contractor, or a larger company serving residential, commercial, or industrial clients, this template provides everything you need to create a strong online presence. 

With pre-built pages, industry-specific layouts, and lead-focused CTAs, you can launch quickly and start connecting with customers right away!

Key features of the Electrician Company template:

  • Pre-built essential pages: Includes readymade layouts for services, projects, about, careers, blog, and contact, so your site is complete from day one.
  • Service-specific design: Tailored layouts for key offerings like emergency repairs, EV charging stations, and LED installations help you target customer needs.
  • Trust signals throughout: Showcase testimonials, certifications, and trust badges to establish credibility and win client confidence.
  • Optimized for local search: Mobile-friendly, SEO-ready, and lightning fast, ensuring customers in your area can find you easily.
  • Simple customization: Built with Elementor and Spectra, you can edit and adapt the design without touching code.
id-113459.post-excerpt: Build trust and generate leads with the Electrician Company WordPress template. A clean, mobile-friendly design for electricians to showcase services and attract clients.

id-73532.title: Alexandrina Kennedy – Designer
id-73532.post-content:
The Designer Link in Bio template has all the benefits of linktrees with better looks, more features, more customization options, and fully responsive designs. They are the ideal way to promote yourself online.

The Designer Link in Bio template has a feminine feel with a small slider to show off your work and links front and center to encourage engagement. All wrapped up in an appealing design that looks amazing on any screen. It’s the perfect Linktree alternative!

Key features of the Designer Link in Bio Template

  • Well-designed Designer Link in Bio Template
  • Fully responsive and works on any screen size
  • Customizable using basic tools
  • Smart slider block to help showcase your creations
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-73532.post-excerpt: Designer Link in Bio template that has all the features you need in a landing page

id-94277.title: Lifestyle Blogger
id-94277.post-content:
The Lifestyle Blogger template delivers a relaxed, reflective vibe ideal for the lifestyle and wellness niches, but could work for any type of blog. It’s modern, refined and creates the kind of welcome we all appreciate.

The homepage includes a featured posts section and different ways of accessing posts via categories or latest posts. There’s also socials, a subscription button and the features you would expect to see on a blog. Everything you see on the page is fully customizable using the block editor or Elementor too!

Key features of the Lifestyle Blogger template

  • Relaxed blog template ideal for lifestyle or wellness
  • Great structure with essential blog elements
  • Fully customizable, including layout, colors and typography
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94277.post-excerpt: The Lifestyle Blogger template has a calm vibe that delivers an instant welcome. It’s a sophisticated design that’s deceptively simple, ideal for all kinds of blogs.

id-94336.title: Nexus News
id-94336.post-content:
The News Blog template is a newspaper theme ready to share lots of information in an organized way. If you run a news website, review site or like to share dynamic content, this is the template for you!

The homepage uses a logical structure with featured stories at the top, simple navigation and a logical structure throughout. It makes it easy to share lots of content without overwhelming the reader. The design is fully compatible with popular page builders so there’s no limit to what you can do with it.

Key features of the Nexus News template

  • Modern newspaper theme
  • Ideal for sharing lots of content in an organized way
  • Very flexible and infinitely customizable
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94336.post-excerpt: The News Blog template is a clean, modern newspaper design ideal for news, reviews and content-driven websites. It’s fast, flexible and ready to share your stories.

id-71669.title: Planet Earth Store
id-71669.post-content:
The Planet Earth Store template is an eCommerce store design that uses graphics and calm colors to create a buying mood. It’s light, well-balanced and provides lots of opportunities to let your products stand out.

The main page opens with a graphical banner you can use to set the scene before opening up into your product selection. Everything is customizable, everything is designed for speed and ease of use and could be used for any type of store.

Key features of the Planet Earth Store

  • Light and welcoming eCommerce store template
  • Uses graphics and calm colors to draw you in
  • Lots of options to build a profitable store
  • Works flawlessly with SureCart and WooCommerce
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-71669.post-excerpt: The Planet Earth Store template is a light store design that’s very easy to use

id-93243.title: Black Friday
id-93243.post-content:
The Black Friday template uses bold design with sales-oriented touches to help your store sell more for BFCM. From the dark background to the contrast colors, it’s an excellent option for selling. It includes a countdown, sales bubble, parallax design and smart design elements to help you sell.

The template needs very little work but can be fully customized to fit your brand. With attractive store and product pages and a slideout cart feature, it’s a fantastic way to sell this Black Friday!

Key features of the Black Friday template

  • Sales-oriented Black Friday store template
  • Dark design with bold contrast colors
  • Attractive store, product and checkout pages
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-93243.post-excerpt: The Black Friday Bonanza template is perfect for businesses looking to maximize sales and attract customers during the biggest shopping event of the year.

id-94316.title: Earthly Elegance
id-94316.post-content:
The Gardening and Landscape template makes it easy to create a professional website. It’s designed specifically for gardening and landscaping, so your services look polished and inviting with minimal effort. 

Customization is simple and you can tweak it to match your brand using built-in tools even if you don’t know WordPress. The template already has built-in sections for services, projects, and testimonials, making it easy to highlight what you do and share feedback from happy clients. It’s an excellent option for gardeners, landscapers and outdoor businesses!

Key features of the Earthly Elegance template:

  • Modern, responsive design suitable for all devices​
  • User-friendly customization with intuitive interface​
  • Fast loading times for optimal performance​
  • Dedicated sections for services, projects, and testimonials​
  • SEO-friendly structure to improve search engine rankings
id-94316.post-excerpt: The Gardening and Landscape template offers a sleek design, user-friendly interface, and swift performance, perfect for showcasing your landscaping business.​

id-94350.title: Home Painting
id-94350.post-content:
The Home Painting template is designed for painting businesses that want a professional look with minimal effort. The flowing layout, bright colors and accessibility make it easy for visitors to browse services, check out past projects, and request quotes. 

The template is fully responsive and looks great on any device. It loads fast works with top page builders, so tweaking the design to match your brand is quick and easy. Whether you’re a contract painter or run a decorating business, this is the template for you!

Key features of the Home Painting template:

  • Bright, welcoming design with great colors
  • Flowing layout with essential elements for small businesses
  • Easy to customize using built-in tools
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94350.post-excerpt: The Home Painting template is a modern design built for painting businesses, decorators or painters. It’s bright, colorful and delivers a high quality finish.

id-94371.title: Digital Design Agency
id-94371.post-content:
The Digital Design Agency template is ideal for design agencies and creative studios that want to spend more time designing for clients than for themselves. Its sleek design is simple, modern and creates a superb first impression, ideal for the growing agency.

The design includes sections for a portfolio, services, and testimonials, designed to make it easy to showcase your work and tell your story. Combined with superb balance, great layout and lots of pro touches, it’s an excellent choice for design professionals, freelancers or agencies​.

Key features of the Digital Design Agency template:

  • Modern, responsive design
  • Creates a professional first impression
  • Includes all essential elements an agency would need
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94371.post-excerpt: The Infinity Studio template offers a modern aesthetic, intuitive customization, and fast performance, ideal for showcasing your digital design agency.

id-94170.title: Web Designer Portfolio
id-94170.post-content:
The Web Designer Portfolio template is crafted to highlight your skills and services with a clean, understated design. The homepage features a striking image that sets the tone, while the use of Helvetica fonts and soothing colors conveys professionalism and trust.

This template offers multiple ways to share your story, showcase your work, and include testimonials, images, videos, and more. It also comes with a pre-designed portfolio page, making it easy to display and promote your projects.

Key features of the Web Designer Portfolio template

  • Elegant and modern portfolio web template
  • A striking header image and headline for instant impact
  • Soft pastel tones and Helvetica fonts create a trustworthy feel
  • Multiple features to showcase your skills and projects
  • Pre-designed portfolio and contact pages for easy setup
  • Seamlessly compatible with top drag-and-drop page builders
id-94170.post-excerpt: A stunning portfolio template perfect for highlighting your personal or professional projects.

id-94399.title: Business Magazine
id-94399.post-content:
The Business Magazine template is designed for sharp, high-impact publishing. Its clean layout, bold typography, and polished visuals deliver a professional look that commands attention. Built with speed in mind, it ensures lightning-fast performance across devices—ideal for readers on the go.

With intuitive customization and zero coding required, this template makes setup simple for beginners and efficient for pros. Seamlessly integrate featured posts, categories, and ads while maintaining a smooth reading experience. It's the perfect starting point for journalists, content creators, and digital publishers!

Key features of the Business Magazine template:

  • Sleek, professional design
  • Shares lots of content in an organized, accessible way
  • Can easily be customized to suit different niches
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94399.post-excerpt: The Business Magazine template is for sharing the news, reviews and personal or professional views. It’s clean, easy to use and ideal for online publishers!

id-94427.title: Generic eCommerce
id-94427.post-content:
The Generic eCommerce store template gives your brand a strong, stylish foundation. Its minimal design keeps products front and center, while clean navigation ensures a smooth shopping experience. Whether you’re selling fashion, tech, or home goods, it adapts easily to any type of product.

Speed and performance are baked in. With optimized code, mobile-ready layouts, and seamless WooCommerce integration, you get a store that loads fast and converts better. Customization is refreshingly simple, so you can launch quickly and scale effortlessly as your business grows!

Key features of the Generic eCommerce template:

  • Clean, product-focused design online store template
  • WooCommerce-ready out of the box
  • Easily customizable so you can build any type of store
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94427.post-excerpt: Launch your online store with this fast, stylish Generic E-Commerce store template. Easy to customize, mobile-friendly, and built for high-performance selling.

id-94444.title: Illustrator Portfolio
id-94444.post-content:
The Illustrator Portfolio template is designed with creativity in mind, offering a sleek and vibrant layout that lets your artwork take center stage. This dynamic template provides the perfect platform to showcase your illustrations, captivate visitors, and attract potential clients.

The template features a visually stunning portfolio gallery, a personalized bio section, an area for client testimonials, and a contact form to encourage seamless client interaction. Additionally, it includes a dedicated portfolio page where you can display your most impressive illustrations in an organized and aesthetically pleasing way.

Key Features of the Illustrator Portfolio Template

  • Minimalist design that’s clean and modern
  • Provides the framework to let your work shine through
  • Lots of whitespace so images really stand out
  • Includes all portfolio essentials
  • Fully compatible with leading page builders
id-94444.post-excerpt: The Illustrator Portfolio template is bold yet minimal, perfectly showcasing your illustrations while keeping the focus on your creativity.

id-94412.title: Travel Agency
id-94412.post-content:
The Travel Agency template makes building a professional travel website easy. Its clean, modern design ensures you can create desire and promote action. Pre-made sections for destinations, packages, and testimonials help you highlight services and share client experiences, ideal for conversion. 

You don’t need to be a WordPress expert—customization is simple with built-in tools that let you match your brand. If you want a site that’s both stylish and functional, this template is a solid pick for your travel business!

Key features of the Travel Agency template

  • Modern, responsive design that looks great on any device
  • Simple customization with an intuitive interface
  • Ready-to-use sections for destinations, packages, and testimonials
  • SEO friendly and fully responsive
  • Full compatibility with popular page builders
id-94412.post-excerpt: The Travel Agency template is a great design that lets you reach for the sky. Amazing layout and fast performance showcasing travel services and tour operators.

id-72580.title: SaaS App Company
id-72580.post-content:
The SaaS App Company template is a vibrant, colorful design ideal for agencies and businesses of all types. It’s light, welcoming and uses graphics throughout to help engage and tell your story. Ideal for new businesses, upstarts, and startups.

The template includes calm colors on well-balanced pages that let you showcase your products and services, and share your successes and your story. There are also additional pages to help build your website with minimal time and effort while looking professional and engaging.

Key features of the SaaS App Company template

  • Light, welcoming colors with modern typography
  • Well-designed pages with lots of customizable content areas
  • Uses graphics to help tell your story
  • Could easily be customized to suit any type of business
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-72580.post-excerpt: SaaS App Company uses vibrant design to help engage your audience and tell your story
